contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} '''USS ''California''''' may refer to: * {{USS|California|1867}} was a screw sloop originally named ''Minnetonka'' * {{USS|California|ACR-6}} was a {{sclass-|Pennsylvania|cruiser}} commissioned in 1907, renamed ''San Diego'' in 1914 and sunk by a mine in World War I * {{USS|California|SP-249}} served during World War I as a motor patrol boat in New York City Harbor; later renamed ''Hauoli'' * {{USS|California|SP-647}} was a motor patrol boat in San Francisco Harbor during World War I. *{{USS|California|BB-44}} was a {{sclass-|Tennessee|battleship}} active in World War II * {{USS|California|CGN-36}} was the lead ship of [[California-class cruiser|her class]] of nuclear-powered guided missile cruisers; known as the "Golden Grizzly." * {{USS|California|SSN-781}} is a {{sclass-|Virginia|submarine}} commissioned in 2011 ;See also * {{USS|Californian|1900}} * {{SS|California}} {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:California, USS}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]] [[Category:United States Navy California-related ships]]
